actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to protect the freedom of choice of Federal employees in employee- management relations.
short_title: Federal Employees Freedom of Choice Act

summary.text: Federal Employees Freedom of Choice Act - Specifies that each employee of the Federal Government shall have the right, freely and without fear of penalty or reprisal, to form, join and assist a labor organization or to refrain from any such activity, and shall be protected in the exercise of this right.

titles.title: Federal Employees Freedom of Choice Act
A bill to protect the freedom of choice of Federal employees in employee- management relations.
